headline: Assessing Cencora (COR) Valuation After Strong Returns And Conflicting Fair Value Signals
summary: What Cencora’s Recent Share Moves Signal for Investors Cencora (COR) has caught investor attention after a steady run, with the stock closing at $353.48 and showing positive total returns over the past year and over the past 3 months. The company reports annual revenue of about $321.3b and net income of $1.6b, alongside annual revenue growth of 6.2% and net income growth of 17.4%. These figures give investors concrete fundamentals to weigh against recent share performance. See our latest...
